name: Rodenbach Classic
description: A bland albeit enjoyable sour that had potential, untimely fell a bit flat.  Notes of cherry, vinegar, and apple; finishing with sour candy.  The beer was a bit thin and could have used a bit more body.

name: Voodoo Ranger Atomic Pumpkin
description: This pumpkin beer could have been great; but the cinnamon was overpowering.  The pumpkin was lost in the mix and the handbarrow seemed to be an after note not caring any flavor or significant heat.

name: Bean Flicker Pumpkin Spice
description: This beer was a great pumpkin beer.  The coffee was a great addition to the pumpkin and the spice was not overpowering.  The beer was pumpkin forward with a hint of cinnamon.  This beer left me wanting a christmas ale, which was an added bonus.
